Author: relapse_central
Text: Thank you! I just hope he forgets I said it (unlikely, he was sober!) But he's a genuine peach and wouldn't bat an eyelid if we got there and I plumped for coke zero, he doesn't pressure me or anything. Aaand he decides where we're going in advance so I can google the menu and cobble something safe together...drunk me is an idiot, but I am one very lucky idiot haha

Author: Little-Rexy
Text: Uggggggg can relate to your post so much! Drinking/ED's really don't mix well... I thought it was just me! I can say tomorrow is a new day, and it can be better if you allow it. Totally have been in the same place! Hugs-
